actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to make it unlawful for any person holding Federal office to accept or receive any honorarium in excess of $500, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any person holding Federal office to accept or receive any honorarium in excess of $500, or to accept more than $5,000 in honorariums in any calendar year. Imposes a $1,000 fine, or 1 year imprisonment, or both, for violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to make it unlawful for any person holding Federal office to accept or receive any honorarium in excess of $500, and for other purposes.
